# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #34](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#34)

#### Terez

Is turning (to the Shadow) reversible?

#### Maria Simons

I don't think so. I wouldn't swear by that.
